info.description: A Realtime Social Networking API built with Fiber
info.title: SOCIALNET API

post.description: This endpoint generates new access and refresh tokens for authentication

get.description: This endpoint logs a user out from our application

post.description: This endpoint refresh tokens by generating new access and refresh tokens for a user
This endpoint registers new users into our application.
This endpoint resends new otp to the user's email.
This endpoint sends new password reset otp to the user's email.
This endpoint verifies the password reset otp.
This endpoint verifies a user's email.

get.description: This endpoint retrieves a comment with replies

post.description: This endpoint creates a reply for a comment

get.description: This endpoint retrieves paginated responses of latest posts

post.description: This endpoint creates a new post

get.description: This endpoint retrieves a single post
This endpoint retrieves comments of a particular post

post.description: This endpoint creates a new comment for a particular post

get.description: This endpoint retrieves paginated responses of reactions of post, comment, reply
get.summary: Retrieve Latest Reactions of a Post, Comment, or Reply

parameters.description: Specify the usage. Use any of the three: POST, COMMENT, REPLY
parameters.name: focus

parameters.description: Enter the slug of the post or comment or reply
parameters.name: slug

parameters.description: Reaction Type. Must be any of these: LIKE, LOVE, HAHA, WOW, SAD, ANGRY
parameters.name: reaction_type

post.description: This endpoint creates a new reaction.

parameters.description: Specify the usage. Use any of the three: POST, COMMENT, REPLY
parameters.name: focus

parameters.description: Enter the slug of the post or comment or reply
parameters.name: slug

parameters.description: Reaction object. rtype should be any of these: LIKE, LOVE, HAHA, WOW, SAD, ANGRY
parameters.name: post

get.description: This endpoint retrieves few details of the site/application.
This endpoint checks the health of our application.

BearerAuth.description: Type 'Bearer jwt_string' to correctly set the API Key
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
